parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.58

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets tooltip for item with given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user dialog to the given data.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetTooltip''' [idc, index, tooltip]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, tooltip]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> tooltip: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetTooltip''' [index, tooltip]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, tooltip]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> tooltip: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetTooltip]] [101, 1, "tooltip"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetTooltip]] [0, "another tooltip"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbSetTooltip]], [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">More information on the [[CT_LISTBOX]] command family can be found [[CT_LISTBOX#Scripting_Example|here]].

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 9, 2017 - 13:03 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
[ Arma 3 v1.75.142535 ] if you want to put linebreaks into a tooltip, use this method: <br>
<code>format [ "%1,%2%3", "hi", parseText "\n", "my name is Will" ]</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
